dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4403400C] LEGAL ATTENTION MANAGING DIRECTOR THEPLANET.COM TTVNOL.COM
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 12:26:24 p.m. (GMT-6) on June
5, 2007.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 10:20 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4403400C] LEGAL ATTENTION MANAGING DIRECTOR THEPLANET.COM
TTVNOL.COM

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

Subject: LEGAL ATTENTION MANAGING DIRECTOR THEPLANET.COM TTVNOL.COM

MIME element (text/plain) 
webmaster@ttvnol.com, admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com,  
copyright@theplanet.com 
You have been sent these same matters many times before, YOU  are the host  
masters of TTNVOL.COM. 
 
as host master for TTVNOL.com YOU are ignoring endless copyright notices  
failing to reply or resolve and as such they deserves criminal investigation  
for breach of the law without any questionable doubt or hesitation 
 
This matter has now gone on for so long a period of time and I have been  
given such run around by THEPLANET.COM AND TTVNOL.com alike that this matter  
now warrants criminal action and arrest of all concerned and that they are  
brought before a court and prosecuted and imprisoned. 
 
If this matter is not resolved by all concerned THEPLANET.COM .com   
TTVNOL.com mark my words I will ensure the entire global community sees the  
criminal case I make out of this and that both SITE AND DOMAIN MANAGERS will  
be closed down for crimes breaching every nations law with intent to procure  
traffic and search engine ranking to their customers and hence their own  
services through deliberate illegal use of copyright material WITH FULL  
CRIMINAL INTENT 
 
 
Three weeks solid you have failed to deal with this MATTER and the site  
owner has failed to remove the material or EVEN MAKE reply. 
 
THEPLANET.COM SEND ENDLESS AUTO RESPONDERS THEN SIMPLY DO ABSULUTELY NOTHING  
TO RECTIFLY THIS,THIS IS A CLEARLY DELIBERATE CRIMINAL ACT IN THEIR PART. 
 
IT IS A CRIMINAL ACT TO KNOWINGLY PROCURE WEB SITE POPULARITY VIA ILLEGAL  
USE OF STOLEN POPULAR MATERIAL TO SOLICIT SEARCH ENGINE RANKINGS AND  
VISITORS TO SERVERS 
 
I AIM TO SEE COMPENSATION NOW ON A DAILY BASIS FROM ALL ONLINE AGENCIES  
ASSOCIATED WITH THIS WEB SITE AND THE CRIME COMMITED RESULTING IN CRIMINAL  
CHARGES TO ALL ASSOCIATED DOMAIN MANAGERS. 
 
Material has illegally been taken, by below shown person using your  
services, This was taken from our Greeting Card web site, despite clearly  
being marked and identified, quite visibly ChrisRS
